resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>10494/81197</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4207</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Christmas and the Gospels</string>
            <string language="es">Navidades y los Evangelios</string>
            <string language="ga">An Nollaig agus na Soiscéalta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weihnachten und die Evangelien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Noël et les evangiles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christmas e os gospels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Natale ed i gospels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστούγεννα και τα Ευαγγέλια</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This religious education resource covers Christmas and the gospels. It is suitable for pupils who are in the following categories - educationally/socially disadvantaged, learning difficulties, dyslexia, refugees, specific learning disabilities, hearing impairment, severe and profound learning disability.</string>
            <string language="es">Este recurso de educación religiosa trata sobre las Navidades y los Evangelios. Es adecuado para alumnos que estén en las siguientes categorías: educacional/socialmente en desventaja, con dificultades de aprendizaje, dislexia, refugiados, discapacidades p</string>
            <string language="ga">Clúdaíonn an acmhainn oideachais reiligiúnach seo an Nollaig agus na soiscéalta. Tá sé feiliúnach do dhaltaí atá sna catagóir seo a leanas – faoi mhíbhuntáiste oideachais/sóisialta, deacrachtaí foghlama, disléicse, teifigh, deacrachtaí foghlama sonracha,</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">General</string>
            <string language="es">General. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Ginearálta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Religionserziehunghilfsmittel umfaßt 
Weihnachten und die Evangelien. Es ist für Schüler verwendbar,
die in den folgenden Kategorien - educationally/socially 
benachteiligte, erlernenschwierigkeiten, dyslexia, Flüchtlinge, 
spezifische erlernenHörschadens, strenger und profunder 
erlernenunfähigkeit der unfähigkeit, des sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette ressource d'éducation religieuse couvre 
Noël et les evangiles. Il convient aux élèves qui sont dans 
les catégories suivantes - difficultés désavantagées et d'études 
d'educationally/socially, dyslexie, réfugiés, incapacité d'étude
d'étude spécifique d'incapacités, d'affaiblissement d'audition, 
grave et profonde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este recurso da instrução religiosa cobre o 
christmas e os gospels. É apropriado para os alunos que estão 
nas seguintes categorias - dificuldades prejudicadas, de aprendizagens
de educationally/socially, dyslexia, refugees, inabilidade de 
aprendizagem de aprendizagem específica das inabilidades, do 
impairment de hearing, a severa e a profunda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa risorsa di formazione religiosa riguarda 
Natale ed i gospels. È adatto ad allievi che sono nelle 
seguenti categorie - difficoltà danneggiate e imparanti di 
educationally/socially, dyslexia, rifugiati, inabilità imparante 
severa e profonda imparante specifica di inabilità, di indebolimento
dell'udito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το θρησκευτικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς εκπαίδευσης
καλύπτει τα Χριστούγεννα και τα Ευαγγέλια. Είναι κατάλληλο 
για τους μαθητές που είναι στις ακόλουθες κατηγορίες - 
εκπαιδευτικά/κοινωνικά μειονεκτούν, μαθησιακές δυσκολίες, 
δυσλεξία, πρόσφυγες, συγκεκριμένη, αυστηρής και βαθιάς μαθησιακή
δυσκολία μαθησιακών δυσκολιών, εξασθένισης ακρόασης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allgemein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Généralités</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Generalità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γενικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
